title: Spirituall encrease: or, Conclusions for pacifying the perplexed conscience of the weake Christian
author: Robertson, Bartholomew, fl. 1620.
publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for William Lee, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleete streete, at the signe of the golden Buck, neare Seriants Inne,
notes: Another issue of STC 21098.5, with quire A reimposed.
Identified as STC 21103 on UMI microfilm, reel 1557.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
